title: Design a URL Preview Service
description: The URL Preview Service is designed to provide a preview of the content contained within a given URL, allowing users to quickly understand the topic and relevance of the page without having to visit it.

title: Design a Collaborative Document Editor
description: Design a collaborative document editor that allows multiple users to simultaneously edit and share documents, requiring real-time updates and conflict resolution mechanisms.

title: Design a Real-Time Chat Application
description: Design a real-time chat application that allows users to send and receive instant messages, with features like user presence, online status, and message persistence.

title: Design a Social Media Feed
description: Design a social media feed that efficiently handles real-time updates, user interactions and caching to provide a seamless user experience while handling high traffic and large amounts of user-generated content.

title: Design a Video Streaming Platform
description: Design a scalable and reliable video streaming platform that can handle millions of concurrent users, offering features like live streaming, on-demand content playback, and seamless user authentication.

title: Design a Distributed Rate Limiter
description: Design a distributed rate limiter that allows for scalable and fault-tolerant control over the rate at which clients can access a shared resource, ensuring fair distribution of throughput across multiple nodes.

title: Design an Online Code Compiler
description: Design a system that accepts user-submitted code, compiles it into an executable format, and returns the compiled output or error messages.

title: Design an Online IDE
description: Design an online Integrated Development Environment (IDE) that enables developers to write, compile, and debug code from anywhere, with real-time collaboration features and seamless integration with version control systems.

title: Design a Cloud File Storage System like Dropbox
description: Design a scalable, secure and highly available cloud file storage system similar to Dropbox that can store and manage massive amounts of user files

title: Design a Ticket Booking System
description: Design a ticket booking system that allows users to search and book tickets for various events, managing availability, pricing, and user preferences.

title: Design a Ride Sharing Application
description: Design a ride-sharing application that connects passengers with drivers, allowing for real-time booking and tracking of rides.

title: Design a News Aggregator
description: A news aggregator system that collects and displays news articles from various sources, with features like real-time updates, categorization, and user filtering.

title: Design a Podcast Hosting Platform
description: Design a platform that enables podcasters to host, manage and distribute their audio content to listeners, while ensuring scalability, reliability, and monetization opportunities.

title: Design a Payment Gateway
description: Design a payment gateway that securely processes transactions, integrates with various payment methods, and provides flexibility for merchants to customize their checkout experiences.

title: Design an Image Sharing App
description: Design an image sharing app that allows users to share and discover visually appealing content, with features such as uploading, commenting, liking, and tagging.

title: Design a Commenting System
description: Design a commenting system that allows users to post and view comments on various content, with features such as comment threading, moderation, and real-time updates.

title: Design a URL Shortener
description: Design a URL Shortener that can handle high traffic and scalability, with features to track clicks and analytics.

title: Design a Logging System
description: Design a scalable and efficient logging system that can handle high volumes of log data from multiple microservices, with features for filtering, aggregation, and analytics

title: Design a Notification System
description: Design a scalable and reliable notification system that can handle high volumes of messages and provide real-time updates to users, while also allowing for customization of notification types and frequencies.

title: Design a Machine Learning Model Deployment Service
description: Design a scalable service to deploy trained machine learning models into production, handling model updates and serving requests efficiently.

title: Design a CI/CD System
description: Automate testing and deployment of software applications from development to production, ensuring continuous integration and delivery.

title: Design a Monitoring and Alerting System
description: A system that continuously monitors various metrics and logs across multiple components, triggering alerts when thresholds are exceeded or anomalies detected, to ensure proactive issue resolution and minimize downtime.

title: Design a Job Queue System
description: Design a scalable system that processes and prioritizes jobs, allowing multiple workers to concurrently execute tasks while ensuring reliable processing and efficient handling of job failures.

title: Design a Live Score Updating System
description: Design a system to update live scores for various sports and events, handling high traffic and real-time updates while maintaining accuracy and reliability.

title: Design a Personal Finance Tracker
description: A personal finance tracker allows users to monitor and manage their financial activities, including income, expenses, budgets, and savings goals.

title: Design a Public Transit Routing System
description: Design a system to optimize public transit routes, minimizing travel time and maximizing efficiency, while considering factors like traffic patterns, road closures, and real-time passenger demand.

title: Design a Fitness Tracking App
description: A system design question about Design a Fitness Tracking App

title: Design a Food Delivery App
description: Design a mobile application that allows customers to order food from local restaurants and track the status of their orders in real-time, providing a seamless and efficient experience.

title: Design a Blog Platform like Medium
description: Design a blog platform that enables users to publish and share their stories, with features like real-time commenting and user engagement tracking, while ensuring scalability and reliability for millions of users.

title: Design a Podcast Recommendation Engine
description: Design a podcast recommendation engine that suggests relevant episodes based on user listening history and preferences, taking into account factors such as genre, topic, and tone.

title: Design a Messaging Queue System like Kafka
description: Design a scalable and fault-tolerant messaging queue system that enables high-throughput and low-latency communication between producers and consumers, with features like partitioning, replication, and offset management.

title: Design a Travel Booking Aggregator
description: Design a system that aggregates travel booking information from multiple sources, allowing users to search and compare prices across different travel websites.

title: Design a Sports Event Management Platform
description: A platform to manage and analyze various aspects of sports events, including schedules, scores, player data, and venue information.

title: Design a Document Scanning and OCR Service
description: Design a scalable service that scans documents and performs Optical Character Recognition (OCR) to extract text data, suitable for cloud-based deployment

title: Design a Scalable Search Engine
description: Design a search engine that can efficiently handle a large volume of queries and provide relevant results while minimizing latency, considering factors like scalability, reliability, and high availability.

title: Design a Hospital Appointment Booking System
description: Design a Hospital Appointment Booking System that allows patients to schedule appointments with various medical specialists, considering different time slots and availability of doctors.

title: Design an Interview Scheduling Platform
description: Design a platform that allows candidates and interviewers to schedule interviews efficiently, considering various constraints such as availability, location, and time zones.

title: Design a Time Tracking System for Remote Teams
description: The system should enable remote teams to track time spent on various tasks and projects, allowing for seamless collaboration, accurate billing, and data-driven decision making.

title: Design a Resume Parsing Service
description: The Resume Parsing Service aims to extract relevant information from a resume, such as skills, experience, and education, to facilitate job matching and applicant tracking.

title: Design a Smart Home Hub Controller
description: A Smart Home Hub Controller is a centralized device that integrates and controls various smart devices, providing a seamless user experience and enhancing home automation.

title: Design a Real-Time Stock Price Tracker
description: Design a system that continuously tracks and updates stock prices in real-time, providing instantaneous insights to users.

title: Design an E-commerce Recommendation System
description: Design a recommendation system for an e-commerce platform that suggests products to customers based on their purchase history and browsing behavior, incorporating aspects of collaborative and content-based filtering.

title: Design a Version Control System like Git
description: Design a Version Control System that efficiently manages large-scale software development, allowing multiple users to collaborate and track changes across various branches and commits

title: Design a Digital Wallet System
description: Design a digital wallet system that securely stores and manages user financial information, allowing for seamless transactions and integration with various payment platforms.

title: Design a Voice Assistant Backend
description: Design a scalable and secure backend system for a voice assistant that integrates with multiple devices, providing personalized experiences to users.

title: Design a Global Weather Forecasting Platform
description: The Global Weather Forecasting Platform aims to collect and analyze weather data from various sources, providing accurate and timely forecasts for global users.

title: Design an Online Voting Platform
description: An online voting platform requires a scalable and secure system to handle multiple users, manage election processes, and provide real-time results, while ensuring the integrity of votes and protecting sensitive information.

title: Design a Survey Collection and Analysis Tool
description: A system designed to collect, store, and analyze survey data from various sources, providing insights and visualization tools for users

title: Design a Public Issue Reporting App for Cities
description: Design a mobile app that enables citizens to report public issues such as potholes, streetlights outages, and traffic congestion, allowing cities to track and resolve these problems efficiently.

title: Design a Remote Team Collaboration Dashboard
description: Design a remote team collaboration dashboard that enables real-time communication, task assignment, and progress tracking for distributed teams to increase productivity and reduce misunderstandings.
